text.disguiseheads.title: DisguiseHeads Settings
text.disguiseheads.enable.enablePlayerDi: Disguise players wearing a player head
text.disguiseheads.enable.enableArmorsta: Disguise armorstands wearing a player head
text.disguiseheads.enable.hideArmorstand: Hide the head of armorstands wearing a player head, so the head has the same size as a normal player head
text.disguiseheads.enable.changeNameToDi: Change the name of the disguised Player to the name of the Player head(only the name above the Player, not affecting chat/tab/etc)
text.disguiseheads.enable.enableArmorsta: Disguise armorstands wearing a cape(assuming the head has a cape)
text.disguiseheads.enable.enableEverythi: Allows any entity wearing a head to disguise as a player. This is a work in progress and may not function correctly.
